rev.comment: Rm graphic; not used in this olympics and fails [[WP:NFCC]] #10c regardless
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
<div class="tright">[[Image:Sailing 2008.png|100px|border|Sailing]]</div>
+
At the '''[[1920 Summer Olympics]]''' in [[Antwerp]], fourteen events in '''[[sailing]]''' were contested, a large increase from the four events contested at the previous Games in 1912. Only one event had more than three entrants and in this event the three-man Belgian boat finished fourth becoming the only boat not to win a medal in any of the fourteen events. Races were held off the coast of [[Ostend]].
At the '''[[1920 Summer Olympics]]''' in [[Antwerp]], fourteen events in '''[[sailing]]''' were contested, a large increase from the four events contested at the previous Games in 1912. Only one event had more than three entrants and in this event the three-man Belgian boat finished fourth becoming the only boat not to win a medal in any of the fourteen events. Races were held off the coast of [[Ostend]].
